hero.subtitulo: You choose the moment, we create the impact. Web and software development from scratch, with premium design and outstanding results.

servicios.subtitulo: At Kairosystem we create digital solutions adapted to you. Whether you're just starting out or want to improve your online presence, we have what you need.

web.descripcion: We design and develop modern, fast websites adapted to your goals. No generic templates: clean code, latest technologies, and personalized design.

software.descripcion: Need more than a website? We create digital tools that fit your business. From internal systems to more complex platforms.
benefits: Solutions made for your business model
Integration with existing APIs and systems

data.descripcion: We turn your data into valuable information. We implement simple solutions to visualize key metrics and make better decisions for your business.

chatbot.descripcion: Automate customer service with a personalized chatbot powered by artificial intelligence. Available 24/7 to answer queries and generate leads.
chatbot.nota: This service is only available for websites developed by us or with accessible code.

servicios.cierre: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us and we'll help you find the perfect solution for your business.
servicios.cierre_contacto: and we'll help you find the perfect solution for your business.

portafolio.subtitulo: These are some projects we've developed for real clients. Each one is made with a focus on design, speed, and functionality. Would you like yours to be next?

proyectos.descripcion: Online store specializing in electronic components and technological items.
Professional portfolio of musician and producer Leo Alfieri.
Modern and attractive landing page for a hospital services brand.
Corporate website for a church with multiple sections including events, ministries, and more.

chatbot.mensaje_bienvenida: Hello! I'm Kairosystem's virtual assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot.error_mensaje: Sorry, an error occurred while processing your message. Please try again later.

cta.subtitulo: Choose the option that best suits your needs and let's start working on your digital project.

presupuesto.descripcion: Fill out the form with the details of your project and we'll send you a detailed proposal in less than 24 hours.

llamada.descripcion: A direct conversation will allow us to better understand your project and offer you the most suitable solution.
llamada.horarios: We have flexible hours to adapt to your schedule. The call lasts approximately 30 minutes, enough time to analyze your needs and propose solutions.

whatsapp.detalle: Our team is available to answer your queries immediately through WhatsApp. This communication channel is ideal for resolving specific questions or starting a conversation about your project.
whatsapp.detalle_atencion: You will be assisted by a specialized advisor who can guide you through the development process of your project. You can share references, ideas, or any relevant information to start working.

formulario.descripcion: Fill out the form with the details of your project and we'll send you a detailed proposal in less than 24 hours.
formulario.email_nota: We'll send the quote to this email address
formulario.telefono_nota: Optional, for additional inquiries about your project
formulario.descripcion_placeholder: Describe your idea, objectives, desired functionalities, and any relevant details for your project...
formulario.descripcion_nota: The more details you provide, the more accurate the quote will be
formulario.exito_mensaje: We have received your quote request. Our team is analyzing your project and we'll send you a detailed proposal in less than 24 hours.

logo.descripcion: We transform ideas into exceptional digital solutions. Specialists in web development and custom software.
